Option.name: Merge or compare feeds
Option.Description: The chart can gather several feeds using the same facets. You can either choose to 'merge' or 'compare' feed values. Note that you can only merge count aggregation.

Option.name: Max number of categories
Option.Description: Specifies the maximum number of facet categories to display. You must enter an integer.

Option.name: Destination page on click
Option.Description: Indicates the URL that must be accessed for a refinement option. If blank, you stay on the same page.

Option.name: Force refinement for feeds
Option.Description: Forces refinements on the specified feeds.

Option.name: JavaScript options
Option.Description: Lets you customize some javascript options used by the Highcharts library. Your javascript options will overwrite the default ones. For example, it can be useful to redirect clicks on pages.

OptionsGroup.name: Data processor
OptionsGroup.Description: The Data Processor allows you to manipulate the json before its execution. Be careful, some properties of the data object may be overridden by the ones set in the Javascript tab.

Option.name: Javascript function
Option.Description: Lets you define the Javascript function that will be executed on data before the Highcharts processing.

Option.name: Width
Option.Description: Specifies the width of the widget (pixels). You must enter an integer.

Option.name: Height
Option.Description: Specifies the height of the widget (pixels). You must enter an integer.
